channel.title: Loading error related to gibs and models
channel.description:
Hi,
Had a bit of a weird one earlier tonight, I had gibbed a bunch of Vorts and when the game reloaded, there were static models floating above each gib chunk
[img]https://i.imgur.com/n8zFZJi.jpg[/img]

item.title: Loading error related to gibs and models
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Hahahaha, oh wow.

I actually had a similar glitch in MP where a spectator would see static model of another player floating in air.

Read full topic
item.source: Loading error related to gibs and models
